Overview[edit | edit source]

Main article: Fletching training

Training methods for Fletching will be very similar to the main game.

Fletching is modified by all tier 1 relics.

  • Endless Harvest greatly increases the speed at which players can obtain logs to fletch.
  • Production Master allows players to fletch an inventory of logs instantly.
  • Skilling Prodigy allows players to bypass low-level and low XP content.

Training[edit | edit source]

Zero time training[edit | edit source]

  • Dart making can be an extremely fast way to train Fletching.
    • Desert✓ is recommended for completion of The Tourist Trap in order to smith dart tips, otherwise this may not be a reliable training method. Darts can be fletched starting at level 10 with bronze darts, up to level 95 with dragon darts. Desert area is not required to fletch darts, it is only required to smith dart tips.
  • Bolt making is comparable to making darts, albeit with less experience per action. Bolts require feathers and unfinished bolts which can be smithed by everyone. Broad bolts can be fletched at level 55 after redeeming the slayer reward and can be very useful for a cheap powerful ammo for crossbows.

Other methods[edit | edit source]

  • Headless arrows can be made at level 1 Fletching with arrow shafts and feathers. This provides up to 45,000 base xp per hour. Metal arrow tips can be smithed and added to the headless arrows for even greater experience. Since steel bars are a very common resource, making steel arrows at level 30 Fletching is possible in large volume. Making steel arrows can give up to 225,000 base experience per hour.
  • Bow making is a slower but very reliable way to train fletching. If Production Master is taken, an inventory full of unfinished bows can be strung instantly, resulting in incredible experience per hour.
    • Bow string can be made from flax on a spinning wheel or created with lunar spells if Fremennik✓ is unlocked.
      • Flax can be picked in the following areas:
        • Tirannwn✓ near north-west bank in Prifddinas, closest patch to a bank
        • Tirannwn✓ outside the bank in Lletya
        • Kandarin✓ Tree Gnome Stronghold
        • Kandarin✓ south of Seers' Village
        • Fremennik✓ on Lunar Isle
        • Asgarnia✓ in Taverley
      • Flax is a possible resource from Managing Miscellania in Fremennik✓
      • Zulrah in Tirannwn✓ and Kurasks in Fremennik✓ have fairly frequent flax drops
      • Temple Trekking in Morytania✓ is the fastest way to obtain bowstrings, as up to 3,000 per hour can be redeemed

Temporary boosts[edit | edit source]

Item Region Notes
Spicy stew (orange spice) Desert✓ Boosts Fletching by ±0-5. Requires manual completion of the Freeing Evil Dave subquest in Recipe for Disaster.
Dragonfruit pie Misthalin✓ Boosts Fletching by 4. Requires 73 Cooking and 81 Farming to obtain.

Skillcape[edit | edit source]

Item Region Master Notes
Fletching Cape Kandarin✓ Hickton Obtain a mithril grapple and bronze crossbow three times per day.

[[Fletching]] is modified by all [[Trailblazer_League#Tier_1_relics|tier 1 relics]]. * [[Endless Harvest]] greatly increases the speed at which players can obtain logs to fletch. * [[Production Master]] allows players to fletch an inventory of logs instantly. * [[Skilling Prodigy]] allows players to bypass low-level and low XP content. ==Training== ===Zero time training=== * Dart making can be an extremely fast way to train Fletching. **{{TB|Desert}} is recommended for completion of [[The Tourist Trap]] in order to smith [[dart tips]], otherwise this may not be a reliable training method. Darts can be fletched starting at level 10 with [[bronze darts]], up to level 95 with [[dragon darts]]. Desert area is not required to fletch darts, it is only required to smith dart tips. * [[Bolt]] making is comparable to making darts, albeit with less experience per action. Bolts require feathers and [[unfinished bolts]] which can be smithed by everyone. [[Broad bolts]] can be fletched at level 55 after redeeming the [[slayer reward]] and can be very useful for a cheap powerful ammo for [[crossbows]]. ===Other methods=== * [[Headless arrows]] can be made at level 1 Fletching with [[arrow shafts]] and [[feathers]]. This provides up to 45,000 base xp per hour. Metal arrow tips can be smithed and added to the headless arrows for even greater experience. Since [[steel bars]] are a very common resource, making [[steel arrows]] at level 30 Fletching is possible in large volume. Making steel arrows can give up to 225,000 base experience per hour. *Bow making is a slower but very reliable way to train fletching.
